sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，月光洗去了今晚天际中星星们昏暗的光。

sentences.english: I will clothe the heavens with darkness, and will make sackcloth their covering.
sentences.chinese: 我可使黑暗笼罩诸天，使麻衣掩蔽天际。

sentences.english: October 2007. A Skyline client wins a bid in a province.
sentences.chinese: 2007年10月，天际线的一家客户在某省中标。

sentences.english: Set the bird's wings with gold and it will never again soar in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 把黄金系在鸟翅上，鸟儿将永远不能翱翔于天际。

sentences.english: All that night the aurora flamed and shimmered lurid colors across the sky to the north.
sentences.chinese: 整个夜晚北面的天际闪烁着忽明忽暗的光芒。

sentences.english: I learned to fly, I can hover in the sky of.
sentences.chinese: 我学会了飞翔，我能翱翔于天际了。

sentences.english: The great pageant of thee and me has overspread the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你我的盛会蔓延到天际。
到处都是模糊的天际线。

sentences.english: Just look to the stars and beyond.
At this period, Ying white of the light pillar damage to cost a lumber moncler jackets rush by horizon.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，莹白的光柱突破花林，冲向天际。

sentences.english: Let's reach for the sky together. Happy New Year!
sentences.chinese: 让我们比翼双飞到天际。新年快乐!

sentences.english: When the sun sets, the sky is dyed red.
sentences.chinese: 当夕阳西下之时，天际被染成了红色。

sentences.english: The blue sky above, goshawk action is ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 蔚蓝的天际之上，“苍鹰”行动正在进行之中。

sentences.english: Or a piping hot ball of fire that looked west across the sky?
sentences.chinese: 或是看着西边那个滚热的火球划过天际？

sentences.english: But clouds that sail across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 但当朵朵云彩在天际飘过。

definition: multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
